Reviews.Title: Great Phone
Reviews.Author: Philip J. Scherrens "Love and Waves"
Reviews.Content: I ordered this from BW Group on Jan 18, 2013 and it arrived on Jan 23, 2013. Talk about fast shipping!The phone is beautiful. I opened the package, popped in a 16GB microSD card and my T-Mobile sim card andeverything worked great.The phone is fast with every application, not a single crash in the few days i've had it running.It comes with 2 batteries, microUSB charger, a screen protector, and a case to protect the sides/rear of thephone, headphones, etc. Tons of extra goodies come with this phone.The camera is great (although I have nothing to compare it to, this is my first "smart" phone)Definitely use the screen protector as the screen doesn't appear to be glass.I came very close to buying the "4S" version of this phone because it had so many positive reviews... but thenI saw the "5" version of this phone and I am VERY glad I got the 4.0" screen.I seriously love this phone! Grab one before it's too late!!!!

Reviews.Title: A four star phone.
Reviews.Author: dramaqueen17
Reviews.Content: This phone is good, but don't be expecting an iphone. For the price, I think this phone does well. It is very light (plastic not metal for the most part). The construction could be a little more solid, but if you don't drop your phone all the time it should be good. Both cameras are decent. It has a good amount of memory and works smoothly. The screen is bright and responsive. I could be happier  with this version of Android OS. My main complaint (I upgraded from 2.3) is that it doesn't seem to have as many options in the settings. I still can't figure out how to make the screen flash when I get a text. I don't know if it doesn't have that feature or if I just can't find it. The charger requires a mini usb so I am able to use my old phone's charger with it which I am happy about. The sound is ok...a little rocky when it's all the way up, but not too bad. I have AT&T; and put my go phone chip in the first slot (there are two) and I haven't noticed any problems with signal. I use the wifi a lot and it works fine. All in all, it is a solid four star phone for me. It's not the best ever, but for this price it's pretty good.

Reviews.Title: Great fone for tmobile prepaid!!!!!!!!!!!!! love it!
Reviews.Author: Chris Swiontek
Reviews.Content: great phone fo Tmobile preaid ! im actually writing this review from my laptop teathering of the WIFI hotspot on this fone right now=)  first off:  - its fast! very responcive to touch and feels good in hand {very lightweight too}  - runs 4.1.1. android  actually has enouh system resources to use it ! {nice dual core A9 cpu and a PowerVR SGX531 graphics chipset--which means it can run really highend games and renderings smoothly}  - WILL TAKE UP TO A 32GIG MICRO SD ! {i got one in it now and it works great}  - looks like an iphone 5 ,but just a smidge bigger {1.8mm wider / 2mm longer / 1.2mm  thicker} but  if you put one  side by side with one,they are pretty darn close {the hero actually looks better}  -COMES WITH A NICE CLEAR HAD SELL CASE included!  - GREAT battery life {bout 9hrs  constant talktime and heavy use /wifi gps/ect..and DAYS OF STANDBUY}  [ TO increase battery life to this level ,i installed SuperBox Pro and got rid of all the; B.S. running in th background]  -Flawless GPS ! [i heard somepeople have issues wit the gps,so heres how to gt it working perfect and fast:  step1:  go to settings /the location settings  step2:  check  "gps satellites" , "GPS EPO ASSISTANCE" ,and "A-GPS" THEN reboot your phone  step3:  turn on your GPS and step out side "line of site "to the clear sky and wait bout 5min.  DONE!  the reason for having to do this is that the fone was originally built and tested in CHINA,so the fone has never "seen" the locations of the satalites over the U.S.A. ,ITS STIL LOOKING FOR THE ONES OVER CHINA=)  by following steps 1-3 you are teaching the fone where the satalites are located and now will work perfectly in the usa. [and the fone is now  triangulating the locations of usable satalites in real time and will remember them-you only have to do this once]  - ALSO...................this fone comes ROOTED right out of the box!  no need to hack it  - free wifi mobile HOTSPOT!  {im using it now actually}  ifyou actually have a data plan  - speaker isLOUD! [good thing]  and the mike on it is pretty sensitive. calls have good sound quality  -GREAT RECEPTION!  [picked up better signal thn my tmobile G1,and thats saying something]now for the cons: {minor actually,but i do need to mention them}  -hard shell real iphone 5 cases WILL NOT FIT THIS FONE [but it comes with one that does,] ,but quitea few of the silicon ans soft cases DO ,so check around and experament a little  -Removing the back plate to get to the battery and sim is a little tricky the first time until you learn the trick to it, but after that its pretty simple [there is a sticker on the outside of the back plate of the fone fresh outa the box...PAY ATTENTION TO IT! nuff said=)  -beside that ...its a great fone!just buy it,youll love it=)

Reviews.Title: I love this phone!
Reviews.Author: Maria Victoria Gomez
Reviews.Content: I love that it looks exactly like an iPhone but it has Android's latest OS,Ice Cream Sandwich. Its fast and I love how the center button (pad) works as a back or return button and the hold button on the left as a menu.It came unlocked, with earphones, a clear hard case and a Android manual.Its a great phone with great price!

Reviews.Title: phone is defective
Reviews.Author: rjs9
Reviews.Content: I am unable to charge my phone for some reason. I tried 3 different chargers and the phone just does not charge, this was not an issue when i first got the phone.

Reviews.Title: Great phone 12-13-2013
Reviews.Author: Oliver Kinney
Reviews.Content: 12-13-2013Great phone 10/101.fake or not, (IT'S A PHONE THAT WORKS POINT BLANK)2.Rather buy a phone for this price than a $500.00 phone that does the same thing.3.Quality of the phone is solid.4.Very fast loading, touch screen movement, messaging, and everything5. compact phone6. Great priceBad1. received phone one day late.2.I can't seem to get the back of the phone off. (that's my problem not the manufactures problem)I've bought two phone from amazon so far, and I am a satisfied customer. I recommend anyone who wants a good phone at a good price to purchase this phone. I don't have any complaints. A+++++++++++Hero H2000+ MTK6577 Dual Core Smart Phone Android 4.0 3G GPS 4.0 Inch White...

Reviews.Title: Awesome.!
Reviews.Author: D.Angel
Reviews.Content: This Phone is actually really NICE!! I love it alot.. the only thing is finding a cute case for it or something, Because the iphone5 case doesnt fit on here.. Its actually bigger than the iphone5! <3oh and another thing.. i have to keep adding common words to the user dictionary because NO words are programmed into the phone! but it is still an awesome PHONE!!

Reviews.Title: DONT!
Reviews.Author: Alexander
Reviews.Content: first of all i ordered this phone and recieved the wrong phone. it arrived extremely late and once i got it and decided to use the phone it didnt even work. so i had to get it repaired THEN it froze every 10 seconds. everytime i put the heaphone jack in and take it out it still thinks the headphones are still plugged in so i have to restart it every time im done with music. very poorly made. i would jave given no stars but seeing that i have to give at least one  i did. DONT BUY THIS CRAP!

Reviews.Title: Much more than I expected.
Reviews.Author: Christopher
Reviews.Content: I must admit, when I ordered this phone I hoped for the best but prepared for the worst.  I'm happy to say I got what I hoped for.  It's got a solid build, cameras are great, and a ton of features.  I originally bought it as a temporary replacement because I broke my last phone but I can say I'll definitely be keeping this as my permanent phone.Make sure you order from a dealer in the USA.  If you order from overseas, even though they ship it in a few days it still takes almost a month to make it through customs.Overall a very good deal.  I would and have already definitely recommend it to friends.

Reviews.Title: You are buying a tool. Pay more geta name brand
Reviews.Author: manijeh Borhanian
Reviews.Content: 1) Bluetooth does not stay on and cuts out frequently.2) software is corrupted3) can't call back on the number you missed  must retype the numbers4) too many steps for any function5)had to download special apps to be able to erase history

Reviews.Title: Pretty much getting what youre paying for
Reviews.Author: Alex Taylor
Reviews.Content: Great phone! except there is no 3g and glitches from time to time and dies somewhat quickly, so like i said youre getting what you pay for

Reviews.Title: Unable to add/change APN
Reviews.Author: K
Reviews.Content: I am giving this phone a one star rating *for now* because I cannot figure out how to add/change the APN.  I use this phone in the USA with StraightTalk - and while the phone and text messaging work great, INTERNET and MULTIMEDIA/PICTURE MESSAGING will not work until I add/change the APN.  I will gladly change my rating once this issue is resolved.  If anyone can help - I would greatly appreciate it.

Reviews.Title: Simple use only!
Reviews.Author: Adel Shamaun
Reviews.Content: This phone came in a small package. It only contained the phone, charger, and headphone (which they really suck).It didn't come with a microSD nor a case.I'm really disappointed with this purchase.
